___name.description: The name of the Maps Account.

___tags.description: Gets or sets a list of key value pairs that describe the resource. These tags can be used in viewing and grouping this resource (across resource groups). A maximum of 15 tags can be provided for a resource. Each tag must have a key no greater than 128 characters and value no greater than 256 characters.

$eref.description: The SKU of the Maps Account.

___name.description: The name of the SKU, in standard format (such as S0).

_88Sku.description: The SKU of the Maps Account.

___name.description: The name of the SKU, in standard format (such as S0).
